context: Would this work with any headphones like beats or apple headphones?
response: Ive read online that it will. Using the adapter the X1 sends audio to the adapter and then you can plug in what you want as headphones. If you have headphones with a mic it also should work with chat and game audio. But check forums to be sure.
The Razer website says blue in all BlackWidows except the Stealth ones which use brown.

context: If I buy this now, how will the points work since Microsoft changed the point system into currency instead?
response: I don't know what to tell you about this because I bought the Xbox Live 12 Month Gold Starter Kit for my grandson for his birthday.  I'm sorry I couldn't be more help than what I was.
Yes. Sims 3 has toddlers, it's fun to teach them skills. Sims 3 is also easier to figure out. There's a lot of expansion packs with Sims 3. Right now Sims 4 only has 1
It would probably work for those games but it is a Fightstick and they are primarily used for fighting games. I wouldn't recommend using a fightstick for anything else but fighting games.

context: How much violence is in this? I know its rated 10+ but when my kids are playing, it seems there is a lot and I shouldn't be letting them play this.
response: I would say mild violence- but my son is 12 so I'm not overly concerned. I would say it is up to your own discretion and the ages of kids playing.

context: I am replacing a generic white wireless Gamecube controller.  Will it's receiver work with a Wavebird?
response: It depends on the type of channel the generic receiver runs on. If it's more recent i'd guess no, it doesnt seem probable.

context: Does it work with any flight simulator .. for example flight simulator x standard
response: It works amazing, but it is a waste of money if you have a desk to mount everything to

context: Is this one region locked? My console is from Asia
response: Yes its locked.  This game is really great. It took me 3 days to beat it the first time. You can go to needforspeed.com and play more regions. And you'll get more cars & regions to play on. So good luck to you.

context: Does this work with the newer flat screen Tv's? How does the picture look with it?
response: I have a newer flat screen Vizio (I think 42'? 36'? Not sure, but about the width of a microwave) and it works just fine. It plugs into the cable port, so I imagine it works with any TV with cable. The pixels are a little stretched out, but it still looks good.

context: Purchasing for XPlane 10 PC Win7 64bit. I saw older new Saitek rudder pedals on this site for much less money. Which one should I buy for xPlane 10?
response: I've never used X Plane so I can't say. I will say though that I love my pedals, and to me they were worth the cost.

context: Does it come with bluetooth dongle? Mine came without it and I don't know how to connect it to PC
response: easy as pie,1, make sure your controller is disconnected2, go here http://motioninjoy.com/3, download and install the software4, when it tells you to plugin your controller just do it and it will self install the correct drivers from windows update its selffrom there on out it just works.
